#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
int r=a%b;
if(r==0)
return b;
else
return gcd(b,r);
}
int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int n,m;
cin>>n>>m;
if(n==1||m==1)
cout<<max(n,m)<<endl;
else
{
cout<<gcd(n-1,m-1)+1<<endl;
}
}
return 0;
}
